data.title: The Memorial Works of Bogdan Bogdanovic
data.meta_description: The Memorial Works of Bogdan Bogdanovic - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an overview of 20 memorial architectural works designed by Bogdan Bogdanović throughout Yugoslavia between 1952 and 1990. It discusses each work's key details such as location, design elements, history, intended purpose, official and colloquial names, current legal protections, and present condition. The works range from cemeteries and tombs to monuments and parks located in what is now Serbia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, North Macedonia, Croatia, Montenegro, and Kosovo. The document aims to serve as a resource for researchers on Bogdanović's extensive memorial opus and its current state of preservation.
